name: Fire King Avatar Barong
effectText: If a face-up "Fire King" monster(s) you control is destroyed by card effect (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn, during the next Standby Phase after this card was destroyed by card effect and sent to the GY: Add 1 "Fire King" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Fire King Avatar Barong".
